title: Mom of trans teen and others discuss how Randolph can heal after locker room incident
description: Hosts Mikaela Lefrak and Connor Cyrus talk to residents, an education reporter and advocates about a recent dispute over a trans athlete using the locker room at Randolph Union High School.
